item.title: AWS Elasticache - A Cloud Guru Challenge
item.description: This challenge consists of deploying a simple Python application on an EC2 instance and RDS PostgreSQL database instance, and then optimize the performance of the application caching database queries using an ElastiCache Redis cluster.
item.dc:creator: Diego Arce
